text:
(a)     Establishment of Fund. The San Francisco Automated County Warrant System is established as a category two fund to accept any assessment of $7 on any person convicted of violating Vehicle Code Section 40508 or Penal Code Section 853.7. 
     (b)     Use of Fund. Monies in the fund shall be used exclusively for the development and operation of an automated County warrant system. 
(Added by Ord. 316-00, File No. 001911, App. 12/28/2000)

heading.catch_text: SAN FRANCISCO AUTOMATED COUNTY WARRANT SYSTEM.
